author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 25-year-old woman allegedly committed suicide by jumping into a well at her house with her three-year-old daughter, in the early hours of Thursday in Injambakkam.

According to the police, Jhansi (25), a resident of Bharathi Avenue in Injambakkam and daughter of Dharma Rao, had married Eshwar Rao and settled down in Andhra Pradesh, a few years ago. The couple had a three-year-old daughter Pallavi.

A few months ago, the couple had a fight and Jhansi returned to Chennai to stay with her parents. A few days ago, Eshwar Rao came to take his wife and daughter back with him.

Jhansi did not want to go back. However, due to pressure from her parents, train tickets were booked for the trio to Andhra Pradesh on Thursday.

“It appears that she did not want to go with Eshwar. On Thursday morning, the bodies of the mother and daughter were found in the well,” said a police source.

A case has been registered. Sneha’s suicide prevention helpline can be reached at 2464 0050/60.
title: Woman jumps into well with daughter
